title: Workshop on Exemplar/Non-Exemplar Strategies for Concept Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental social science concepts
context.additional_context: Training process to equip working professionals with conceptual learning strategies for systematically analyzing social phenomena.

learning_goals: Learners can identify core attributes of given concepts (e.g., social inequality) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can present three or more evaluation criteria for distinguishing concepts using similar and dissimilar cases.
Learners can classify instances of concept application in project-based assessments with 70% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
